entity.name: Numerical_value
entity.description: A Numerical_value specifies a quantity expressed with a single numerical value and a unit

entity.name: Unit
entity.description: A Unit specifies a quantity chosen as a standard in terms of which other quantities may be expressed.

explicit.name: unit_name
explicit.description:
the term representing the kind of unit.
EXAMPLE gram, litre, or volt.

entity.name: Value_limit
entity.description:
A Value_limit specifies a qualified numerical value representing either the lower limit or the upper limit of a particular physical characteristic.
EXAMPLE -- 30.5 max and 5 min are examples for a Value_limit.

explicit.name: limit_qualifier

entity.name: Value_range
entity.description: A Value_range specifies a pair of numerical values representing the range in which the value shall lie.

explicit.name: upper_limit
explicit.description: the maximum value of the Value_range

entity.explicit: the minimum value of the Value_range

entity.name: Value_with_unit
entity.description: A Value_with_unit specifies either a single numerical measure, or a range of numerical measures with upper, lower, or upper and lower bounds.

explicit.name: unit_component
explicit.description: the unit in which the Value_with_unit is expressed.

explicit.name: significant_digits
explicit.description: the number of decimal digits that are relevant for the use of the Value_with_unit. If present, the numerical measure or range may be specified using more digits than the significant digits but shall not be specified using fewer digits.
